com.xhive.util.interfaces
Interface XhiveFtsTextHandlerIf

public interface XhiveFtsTextHandlerIf

Event handler for events fired by the getTextAndTerms method in the XhiveFtsUtil class. Provide an implementation of this class, and register it on XhiveFtsUtilIf, if you want to be notified of events during the parsing of a full text query.

(c) X-Hive Corporation B.V. (www.x-hive.com)

See Also:
XhiveFtsUtilIf.getTextAndTerms(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer, com.xhive.util.interfaces.XhiveFtsTextHandlerIf)
